executiveSummary.headline: Mashlika Prasanth (Senior Associate, Miles Education) has a foundation in Education & Training and HR/Hiring, with large relative gaps in Technology & Innovation, Leadership & Management, and GTM-related clusters.

timeToImpact.nearTerm_0_3_months: Build foundations in Technology & Innovation and Leadership & Management; start applied practice through 2–3 initiatives.
